doctor.name: Dr. Mostafa Noor Mohsin
doctor.specialty: Gastroenterology, Liver Diseases, Pancreas & Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mostafa Noor Mohsin is a Gastroenterologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Assistant Professor, Gastroenterology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Mostafa Noor Mohsin at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
